sentences.sContent: The lysis of the brain takes place only hours after death.
sentences.sContent_eng: The lysis of the brain takes place only hours after death.
sentences.sCn: 脑的细胞溶解，在死后的几小时就发生了。

sentences.sContent: The weather forecast, in synoptic meteorology, have three methods:pressure field ana-lysis, energy field analysis and entropy field analysis.
sentences.sContent_eng: The weather forecast, in synoptic meteorology, have three methods:pressure field ana-lysis, energy field analysis and entropy field analysis.
sentences.sCn: 天气学天气预报经历着气压场分析方法，能量场分析方法和我们提出的熵场分析方法。

sentences.sContent: The computation of cars running on monocable circulating ropeway is a problem of dyn amic ana-lysis for geometrically nonlinear continuous systems.
sentences.sContent_eng: The computation of cars running on monocable circulating ropeway is a problem of dyn amic ana-lysis for geometrically nonlinear continuous systems.
sentences.sCn: 单线循环式索道车斗运行过程的模拟计算，是个几何非线性连续系统的动力分析问题。

synos.tran: 细胞溶解；病势减退；消散

phrases.pCn: 细胞溶菌作用；胞溶作用

words.tran: 生成细胞溶素的；溶原的；产噬的

trans.tranOther: the destruction or dissolution of cells by the action of a particular lysin
